Name: Electro Rent Corp
Description: DELISTED - Electro Rent Corporation is a global organization devoted to the rental, lease and sale of new and used electronic test and measurement (T&M) equipment. The Company purchases that equipment from manufacturers, such as Agilent Technologies, Inc. (Agilent) and Tektronix Inc. (Tektronix) for use by its customers in the aerospace, defense, telecommunications, electronics, industrial and semiconductor industries. It is also engaged in the rental, lease and sale of electrical test and inspection equipment used in the industrial industry, which includes electrical contractors and utility companies and their related support services providers.
